   marsMcsGroup 객체-그룹

- 객체 { marsMcsAddr, marsMcsDefaultMarsAddr, marsMcsRegistration, marsMcsSsn, marsMcsDefaultMtu, marsMcsFailureTimer, marsMcsRetranDelayTimer, marsMcsRdmMulReqAddRetrTimer, marsMcsRdmVcRevalidateTimer, marsMcsRegisterRetrInterval, marsM csRegisterRetrLimit, marsMcsRegWithMarsRdmTimer, marsMcsForceWaitTimer, marsMcsIdleTimer, marsMcsLmtToMissRedirMapTimer, marsMcsRowStatus, marsMcsMcGrpRowStatus,
